U

updateById(Long, Message) - Method in class org.forum.api.controller.MessageController
Maps all PUT requests to base url/id and updates message entry in database based on specified id with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
updateMessageById(Long, Message) - Method in interface org.forum.api.jdbc.dao.MessageDAO
Connects to database and updates message entry in database based on specified id with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
updateMessageById(Long, Message) - Method in class org.forum.api.jdbc.dao.MessageDAOImpl
 
updateMessageById(Long, Message) - Method in interface org.forum.api.services.MessageService
Service updates message entry in database based on specified id with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
updateMessageById(Long, Message) - Method in class org.forum.api.services.MessageServiceJDBCImpl
